entry.title: Mother Parkers - Exclusive Blend Red Coffee - 64 x 2 Oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mother Parkers
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 94.99

Product Details

Mother Parkers Exclusive Coffee features a mouth-watering blend of the finest Arabica coffee beans for a smooth, gourmet taste you'll love. To create this exclusive blend, Mother Parkers starts with Colombian beans for a full-bodied flavour then adds Guatemalan beans for a slightly spicy note, Costa Rican beans for unparalleled smoothness and richness, and Brazilian beans for their light, nutty character. The result is a delicious coffee with a unique, satisfying personality. Packaged as 64 individually-sealed pouches per carton for long-lasting freshness, this ground coffee makes a great addition to any home or office kitchen.

  • Exclusive blend contains Colombian, Guatemalan, Costa Rican and Brazilian coffee beans for a unique, gourmet taste
  • Individual pouches are tightly sealed for maximum freshness
  • Ideal for home use or to share at the office

Mother Parkers - Exclusive Blend Red - 64 x 2 Oz

entry.title: Folgers - Classic Roast Coffee - 920 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Foldgers
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 12.99

Warm and inviting, this coffee is the ideal addition to your beverage service. Each package of ground coffee contains the mild taste and earthy aroma of carefully-selected Colombian Arabica coffee beans that have been roasted to perfection. Already ground, this medium-roast coffee comes ready to brew, helping to save you time and fill drink orders more quickly! Rather than taking the time to grind whole beans for every order, you can quickly grab a fresh packet for each new pot you brew.

Filled with natural antioxidants, coffee is a great morning beverage choice for your more health-conscious patrons as well! Serve up a hot cup of fresh-brewed black coffee, or pour over ice for a chilled caffeinated beverage that customers will love. For a truly customized and specialty coffee beverage, add a splash of flavoring syrup to each hand crafted cup. The possibilities are limitless!

  • Enjoy your mornings with our Signature Blend of Coffee.
  • Medium Roast blend with smooth, balanced taste.
  • Folgers is an iconic brand that has been brewing great-tasting coffee for over 165 years.
  • Made from Pure 100% Coffee.
  • Savour the fresh aroma of a perfectly brewed cup of Folgers Coffee.

  • Start your mornings with the smooth taste and eye-opening aroma of Folgers Ground Coffees. Enjoy our signature coffee blend - Folgers Classic Roast. A medium roast coffee specially ground for a smooth, balanced taste and aroma.

Folgers - Classic Roast Coffee - 920 g
